description: UniFi Poller v2.0 Displays detailed information for wireless access points in a UniFi network.

targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE $timeFilter AND ap_name =~ /$AP$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/ GROUP BY "channel"
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE ($timeFilter  AND  ap_name =~ /$AP$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/) GROUP BY "radio_proto", "ap_name"

panels.description: This shows an OUI breakdown from Unifi's perspective.

targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE $timeFilter AND ap_name =~ /$AP$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/ GROUP BY "oui"

panels.title: Client / MAC OUI

targets.query: select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE ($timeFilter AND ap_name =~ /$AP$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/)
select count(distinct(hostname)) FROM "clients" WHERE ($timeFilter AND ap_name =~ /$AP$/ AND site_name =~ /$Site$/ AND is_guest = "true")

panels.description: The counters in this table represent uptime totals and do not change with the time range selector.
panels.title: Networks / UAP

targets.query: SELECT "mem_used" FROM "uap" WHERE ("name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "site_name" =~ /^$Site$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT last("num_sta") FROM "uap_radios" WHERE ("device_name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "radio" = 'na') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device_name"

panels.description: Devices TX / RX bytes per second grouped by OUI. RX on negative axis.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(sum("rx_bytes"), 1s) AS "Rx", derivative(sum("rx_bytes"), 1s) AS "Rx" FROM "clients" WHERE ("oui" = 'Htc' AND "is_wired" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "oui" fill(none)

panels.title: Wireless Traffic / Vendor

targets.query: SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT derivative(first("wired-rx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'dns-rtn') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

panels.description: RX is on the negative Axis.
panels.title: 5 GHz Traffic

panels.description: RX is on the negative Axis.
panels.title: 2.4GHz Traffic

panels.description: PPS on the na band. In is on the negative Axis.
panels.title: 5 GHz Packets

panels.description: PPS on the ng band calculated in 30 second buckets. In is on the negative Axis.
panels.title: 2.4GHz Packets

panels.description: Visualize packet errors (several types)  per second in the 5GHz band.
panels.title: 5GHz Drops/Errors

panels.description: In is on the negative axis.
panels.title: 2.4GHz Drops/Errors

list.definition: show tag values from "uap" with key="source"
list.name: Controller
list.query: show tag values from "uap" with key="source"

list.definition: show tag values from "uap" with key="site_name" where source =~ /$Controller$/
list.name: Site
list.query: show tag values from "uap" with key="site_name" where source =~ /$Controller$/

list.definition: show tag values from "uap" with key="name"  where site_name =~ /$Site$/
list.label: UniFi AP:
list.name: AP
list.query: show tag values from "uap" with key="name"  where site_name =~ /$Site$/

title: UniFi: UAP Insights
